sources.name: Renewable electricity (% electricity production)- World Bank
sources.description:
Data published by World Bank- World Development Indicators (WDI)
Data publisher's source World Bank, Sustainable Energy for All (SE4ALL) database from the SE4ALL Global Tracking Framework led jointly by the World Bank, International Energy Agency, and the Energy Sector Management Assistance Program
Link http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/EG.ELC.RNEW.ZS?name_desc=true&view=map&year=2015
Retrieved 2017-05-18

Countries aggregated by income group have been classified based on the World Bank's own definition of income level (low, lower middle, middle, middle upper, and high)
